words.source: H3548 (כֹּהֵן, noun common masculine singular construct) with conjunctive waw and preposition lamed; KJV 'the priest of', ESV 'the priest of', NASB 'the priest of'

H1323 (בַּת, noun common feminine plural absolute); KJV/ESV/NASB 'daughters'

H4390 (מָלֵא, piel wayyiqtol 3fp) with conjunctive waw; KJV/ESV/NASB 'filled'
H853 (אֵת, direct object marker); untranslated in English

H8248 (שָׁקָה, hiphil infinitive construct) with preposition lamed; KJV 'to water', ESV 'to water', NASB 'to water'

H1 (אָב, noun common masculine singular construct + 3fp suffix); KJV/ESV/NASB 'their father's'
